tool_description: With this api you can get top 10 movies of the day by specific platform
title: TOP 10 movies of the day

api_list.name: Get top 10 movies of the day by specific platform
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back the top 10 of the best movies of the day in scpecific platform

api_list.name: Get all the best movies of the day
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back the top 10 of the best movies of the day in all platforms (Netflix, prime video, hulu....)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-10-movies-of-the-day.p.rapidapi.com/movies"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-10-movies-of-the-day.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
